transcript.text: Now that she’s received this message, how should Debbie respond? Select one option and then submit.

correct.text: Kim is clearly not aware of the risks of posting work-related messages on social media and Debbie might feel it’s her role to address this, but in fact the manager needs to be alerted to the possible breach of confidential customer information.
